alert.note: Alert for Graham (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 4:57PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Graham County through 515 PM CDT... At 456 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles north of Nicodemus, or 12 miles northeast of Hill City, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Graham County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
